change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 57/2016, effective March 2, 2016.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Regulation re Strikes
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 112/2014, June 18, 2014]

bcl:section.bcl:text: During the period and for each period that inspectors are on strike, sections 20 (1), (2) and (4), 22, 23 (1), 24 (1), 28 (2) and (3) and 28.1 (1) and (2) of the Livestock Identification Regulation, B.C. Reg. 69/81, do not apply.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Livestock Identification Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 271, section 10]

change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 112/2014, effective June 18, 2014.

bcl:section.bcl:text: During the period and for each period that Inspectors are on strike, sections 20 (1) and (2), 22 (1) and (2), 23 (1), 24 (1) and 28 (2) and (3) of B.C. Reg. 69/81, the Livestock Brand Regulation, have no application.
